INSERT INTO hcm.QUARTERS_HCM ( ID, QUARTERS_NO, QUARTERS_DESC, FUN_DESC, HIRES, QU_QUIRE, EDUCATIONAL, SKILL, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quartersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quartersDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hires,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quQuire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educational,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_hcm.QUARTERS_HCM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE hcm.QUARTERS_HCM
QUARTERS_NO = #{quartersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUARTERS_DESC = #{quartersDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUN_DESC = #{funDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIRES = #{hires,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QU_QUIRE = #{quQuire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATIONAL = #{educational,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKILL = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
